title: Raspberry shortcake
description: To make the toasted breadcrumbs for this recipe, chop up 70g/3oz bread (to include crusts) and spread on a baking sheet. Bake in a preheated 150C/300F/Gas 2 oven for 30 minutes or until lightly toasted; then process to crumbs in a food processor.
ingredients: 40g/1¾oz blanched best-quality almonds, freshly ground (quite fine but still with some texture)
a small bowl of caster sugar
a little icing sugar, for sifting
